mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.username, u.password, u.salt, u.user_num, u.nickname, u.gender, u.phone, u.email, u.qq, u.identity_no, u.birthday, u.now_address, u.home_address, u.avatar, u.job_status, u.user_type, u.start_status, u.entry_time, u.resignation_time, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.del_flag, d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name,d.parent_id, r.role_id,r.role_num,r.role_name,r.data_scope from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.username=#{username} order by u.create_time desc

select u.user_id, u.username, u.password, u.salt, u.user_num, u.nickname, u.gender, u.phone, u.email, u.qq, u.identity_no, u.birthday, u.now_address, u.home_address, u.avatar, u.job_status, u.user_type, u.start_status, u.entry_time, u.resignation_time, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.del_flag, d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name,d.parent_id from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
and u.username like concat(concat('%',#{user.username}),'%')
and u.user_num like concat(concat('%',#{user.userNum}),'%')
and u.nickname like concat(concat('%',#{user.nickname}),'%')
and u.dept_id=#{user.deptId} and u.job_status=#{user.jobStatus} and u.start_status=#{user.startStatus} and u.user_type=#{user.userType} and u.del_flag='0' and u.user_id!=1
order by u.create_time desc
